# Memory- based Algorithm
## Similarity Weight
### Pearson Correlation(not required)
```{r}
pearson_ms_train <- cor(t(ms_train_mat), method = "pearson")
```

### Spearman Correlation(1,2)
```{r}
spearman_ms_train <- cor(t(ms_train_mat), method = "spearman")
```
